channel.title: MrJTDekker plays Black Mesa
channel.description:
Hey guys! My name is MrJTDekker and I love playing games. Half-Life 1 and 2 are my favorite games of all time! So I have been following the Black Mesa project since I first heard about it a looong time ago.
I have a [url='https://www.youtube.com/mrjtdekker']YouTube Channel[/url] where I upload all kinds of Lets Play videos. So I was ecstatic when Black Mesa was finally released and I was able to get my hands on it. Obviously I am jumping on the boat a little late, but hey better late than never.
[i]Thanks for your time![/i]
[u]Feel free to check out my LP of Black Mesa here:[/u] [b][url='https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLSHaCEXt8TTc_qi5M_NLszZxaDefRO0_o&feature=view_all']Full Playlist[/url][/b] New Black Mesa episodes every Monday
If you like what you see, check out my [url='https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLSHaCEXt8TTeGuPDP5exnN1orb0JfeRUI&feature=view_all']Antichamber[/url], [url='https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLSHaCEXt8TTcEPtKSPW2sh3xFVsTlAofH&feature=view_all']Fatal Frame II[/url], [url='https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLSHaCEXt8TTce2LkSvGu8cPwIGay_Hm3w&feature=view_all']Dead Space 3[/url], or [url='https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLSHaCEXt8TTcFJssh6cjzcZ0TDNEO3emH&feature=view_all']Skyrim: Madness[/url] LPs.
[b]Black Mesa - Episode List:[/b]
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t8XGY_KGOOs']Black Mesa - Part 1: Standard Insertion Procedures[/url]
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y6YwM1idFWc']Black Mesa - Part 2: Resonance Cascade[/url]
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FWQ5ekTWrHs']Black Mesa - Part 3: Jumping Puzzle. Yay[/url]
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pWl1XvDoMAI']Black Mesa - Part 4: JT vs Turret[/url]
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PtxfajMahDM']Black Mesa - Part 5: Containment[/url]

item.title: MrJTDekker plays Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: MrJTdekker
item.description:
Hey guys! My name is MrJTDekker and I love playing games. Half-Life 1 and 2 are my favorite games of all time! So I have been following the Black Mesa project since I first heard about it a looong time ago.

I have a YouTube Channel where I upload all kinds of Lets Play videos. So I was ecstatic when Black Mesa was finally released and I was able to get my hands on it. Obviously I am jumping on the boat a little late, but hey better late than never.

Thanks for your time!

Feel free to check out my LP of Black Mesa here: Full Playlist
New Black Mesa episodes every Monday

If you like what you see, check out my Antichamber, Fatal Frame II, Dead Space 3, or Skyrim: Madness LPs.

Black Mesa - Episode List:

Black Mesa - Part 1: Standard Insertion Procedures

Black Mesa - Part 2: Resonance Cascade

Black Mesa - Part 3: Jumping Puzzle. Yay

Black Mesa - Part 4: JT vs Turret

Black Mesa - Part 5: Containment
